features:
Weather-Proof Shell with Warm Recycled Down Insulation: 
2-layer 100% recycled polyester shell is made with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish; insulated with 700-fill-power 100% Recycled Down (duck and goose down reclaimed from down products)

Internal Bonded Channels: 
Bonded channels prevent the 700-fill-power 100% Recycled Down from shifting for the ultimate in warmth

Center-Front Zipper: 
The two-way, center-front zipper has a zipper garage at the chin, a wind flap and snap closures

Warm, Insulated Hood: 
Insulated, removable hood with hidden drawcords that cinch down for protective warmth

Two Handwarmer Pockets: 
On-seam handwarmer pockets have a soft, brushed jersey lining for warmth and comfort; a media-compatible, internal zippered pocket holds a phone and other daily necessities

Thigh Length: 
The trim, streamlined fit allows the down insulation to conform closely to the body and trap heat more efficiently; the thigh length hem provides extra coverage for additional warmth

Supporting the People Who Made This Product: 
Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor

Country of Origin: 
Made in Vietnam.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nShell: 2-layer, 3.6-oz 50-denier 100% recycled polyester with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
tech_specs.\u2022 \nLining: 2.2-oz 50-denier 100% recycled polyester ripstop with a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemistry)
tech_specs.\u2022 \nInsulation: 700-fill-power 100% Recycled Down (duck and goose down reclaimed from down products)
